entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 19 this evening. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 23 January 2023
